channel.name: Classica DE
channel.title: Debussy
channel.desc: Dirigent Alain Altinoglu leitet die Philharmonia Z?rich, den Zusatzchor des Opernhaus Z?rich und die SoprAlti der Oper Z?rich in einer Interpretation von Debussys Pell?as et M?lisande, einer Oper in f?nf Akten, die auf dem franz?sischen Libretto zu Maurice Maeterlincks Theaterst?ck basiert. Das Werk feierte seine Premiere 1902 in der Pariser Op?ra Comique und dreht sich um ein kompliziertes Dreiecksverh?ltnis zwischen Liebenden. Prince Golaud trifft unverhofft auf Melisand?, eine mysteri?se junge Frau, deren Herkunft ihm unbekannt ist. Nach seiner Hochzeit begibt sich das Paar zum Schloss von Golauds Gro?vater, King Arkel. Dort kommt Melisand? Golauds j?ngerem Halbbruder immer n?her. In den Hauptrollen: Brindley Sherratt (Arkel), Jacques Imbrailo (Pell?as), Kyle Ketelsen (Golaud) und Corinne Winters (M?lisande). Dmitri Tscherniakow f?hrte Regie in dieser Aufnahme von 2016 aus dem Z?richer Opernhaus.

channel.name: Cooking Channel US
channel.title: Cupcake Wars
channel.desc: In each episode, four of the country's top bakers compete for a $10,000 prize in a cupcake-baking competition. The show consists of three rounds, with one contestant eliminated after each round. In round one, the contestants must baking a cupcake that is judged on taste alone. Baking three cupcakes is the task in the second round, when they are judged on both taste and presentation. Then, the remaining two bakers are each given a five-person team in the final round, in which they have two hours to make 1,000 cupcakes. The baker who the judges determine made the best cupcakes in all three rounds takes home the cash.

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: ?thiopie, L?espoir Vit De L?autre Cote (refugies)
channel.desc: Le HCNUR estime que plus de 720 000 r?fugi?s (y compris des mineurs non accompagn?s) sont actuellement en ?thiopie en provenance du Soudan du Sud, de la Somalie et de l??rythr?e. S?par?s de leurs familles et confront?s ? un manque d?options d?installation ou de r?installation ? long terme, les r?fugi?s ressentent nostalgie et incertitude quant ? l?avenir, ce qui provoque frustrations, d?pression et d?pendance. Dans le camp de Shimelba, pr?s de 70 % des 8 000 r?fugi?s sont issus de tribus catholiques. Le p?re Ghiday Alema, originaire d?Adigrat, les visite chaque semaine, c?l?brant la messe, cat?chisant, ?coutant les gens, jouant avec les enfants ? essayant de donner de l?espoir dans une situation o? l?espoir semble presque perdu. channel.name: Z Living US
channel.title: The Carol Burnett Show
channel.desc: Comedian and stage actress Carol Burnett, who first gained popularity during her stint on "The Gary Moore Show," hosted this one-hour variety series. Her talented supporting players included Harvey Korman, Tim Conway, Vicki Lawrence (who got the job based on her resemblance to Burnett) and Lyle Waggoner. Skits often featured guest stars, such as Mama Cass of the Mamas and the Papas or singer Steve Lawrence. One sketch, "The Family" (which featured Lawrence as the persnickety Mama and Burnett as her hotheaded daughter) was later spun-off into it's own sitcom.
